title: No, you don’t actually have $500 of Google Store credit following erroneous UI tweak
content:
As of late, the Google Store has undergone a few tweaks, but the latest change unfortunately results in people thinking they have $500 of store credit available to them. 

more…

The post No, you don’t actually have $500 of Google Store credit following erroneous UI tweak appeared first on 9to5Google.
